description: This file demonstrates how to use langfuse via OpenLIT to trace model calls, including setting up environment variables, initializing tracing, and creating an agent with specific tools and models.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that uses a language model and tools to perform tasks, with options for markdown output and debug mode.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class representing an OpenAI chat model, identified by a specific ID.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool class providing DuckDuckGo search capabilities.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to output the response to a given prompt.
